text: Bhakkar District () is a district in the Punjab province of Pakistan. The city of Bhakkar is the capital. ==Administration== The district is administratively divided into four tehsils and 42 Union Councils of Pakistan * Bhakkar Tehsil * Darya Khan Tehsil * Kaloorkot Tehsil * Mankera Tehsil Category:Sargodha Division
title: Bhakkar District
